divs: Sighting DetailsLight appeared became really bright and then disappeared. it was before stars came out and it was stationary the whole time. There was a jet in the area so I am ruling out atmospheric distortion as the reason for disappearing. More info on the other report that was submitted on sept 23 2013 in surprise az.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Surprise
There were no other sightings in Surprise on or around September 29th 2013
Summary: Just saw the same event I reported on the 23rd - light appears then disappears
